note:
I am a disable Veteran and a podcaster. I co-host the show TwoGrumpy Vets and a Duuude. You can go to twogrumpyvets.com to listen and subscribe. We are Podcast 2.0 Compliant and are really having fun with this.

I am also a ham radio operator. I really enjoy being able to use a radio and a wire to talk around the world. When I doing any of those things I love learning new things and driving my Jeep.
